signupPage.passwordPattern: User letters, numbers and special characters except \

home.NewListMessage: Choose some recipes to add to your list

warnings.NetworkMessage: Please check your connection and reload the browser.
warnings.AuthError: We couldn't identify you. Please sign in again.

quickTour.tab: Change between your recipes and grocery lists.
quickTour.card: Drag to move around or click to edit.
quickTour.add: Add new recipes or create new lists.
quickTour.account: Log out, or access your accout's details

homepage.subtitle1: We'll search the calories for you.
homepage.title2: Create grocery lists in an instant

process.welcome: Welcome to my first web app
process.thanks: Thanks to the amazing community for the libraries
process.iconify: provides some icons used throughout the app.
process.avatar: generates unique avatars for the users.
process.i18next: simplifies translating the app to English, German and French.
process.kute: manages morphing animations on the homepage.
process.dnd: manages drag and drop action on ingredients.
process.icon: provides some icons used throughout the app.
process.observer: detects when DOM elements are on screen to allows animation on scroll.
process.cors: configure CORS settings for the backend.
process.figma: was used for wirefrmaing, prototyping, and creating custom SVGs.
process.git: CLI was used for version control.
process.github: hosts the frontend via GitHub pages.
process.text: After completing an online full-stack engineering course in November 2022, and stated working on my first full-stack project. I wasn't sure where to begin. I had a clear idea of what I, wanted the app to do, but I didn't know how it should look like. Therefore I started to work on the database. As the app took on some funcitonalities, I got more confident with its UI direction.
